lead_paragraph: The former senator turned lobbyist worked to establish the high-level contacts that led the president-elect to call the president of Taiwan last week.

byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and ERIC LIPTON

headline.print_headline: Dole Was Agent for Taiwan Aides in Trump’s Call
headline.main: Bob Dole Worked Behind the Scenes on Trump-Taiwan Call

snippet: The former senator turned lobbyist worked to establish the high-level contacts that led the president-elect to call the president of Taiwan last week....
abstract: Lobbyist and former Republican Sen Bob Dole worked behind scenes for six months to establish high-level contact between Taiwanese officials and Pres-elect Donald Trump, actions that resulted in Trump's controversial phone call to Taiwan's president; Washington law firm Alston & Bird received $140,000 for Dole's efforts; revelation suggests call was not political blunder but part of plan by Taiwan to use seasoned lobbyist to leverage Trump's election for closer relationship with United States.
